files.name: spaceone/api/cost_analysis/v1/data_source.proto
files.description: A DataSource is a plugin instance collecting external cost data. External cost data consists of `raw data` and the plugin information used for collection.

messages.name: DataSourceInfo
DataSourcesInfo

fields.name: cascade_delete_cost
fields.description:
Default value is true. If true delete all cost data related to data_source_id
+optional

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a DataSource with information of the plugin to use. Information of the plugin includes `version`, `provider`, and `upgrade_mode`.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a specific DataSource. You can make changes in DataSource settings, including `name` and `tags`.

methods.name: update_plugin
methods.description: Updates the plugin of a specific DataSource. This method resets the plugin data in the DataSource to update the `metadata`.

methods.name: update_secret_data
methods.description: Updates the secret data of plugin for DataSource. This method updates the secret data in the DataSource to update the `secret_data`.

methods.name: verify_plugin
methods.description: Verifies the plugin of a specific DataSource. This method validates the plugin data, `version` and `endpoint`.

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enables a specific DataSource. By enabling a DataSource, you can communicate with an external cloud service via the plugin.

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disables a specific DataSource. By disabling a DataSource, you can block communication with an external cloud service via the plugin.

methods.name: deregister
methods.description: Deregisters and deletes a specific DataSource. You must specify the `data_source_id` of the DataSource to deregister.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Manually runs a specific DataSource to collect the cost data. This method is to get up-to-date cost data.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets a specific DataSource. Prints detailed information about the DataSource, including `name`, `state`, and `plugin_info`.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Gets a list of all DataSources. You can use a query to get a filtered list of DataSources.

scalarValueTypes.notes: Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers  if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers  if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s.
Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28.
Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56.
A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text.
May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes.
